00001 //  MeCab -- Yet Another Part-of-Speech and Morphological Analyzer
00002 //  $Id: dictionary_compiler.cpp 173 2009-04-18 08:10:57Z taku-ku $;
00003 //
00004 //  Copyright(C) 2001-2006 Taku Kudo <taku@chasen.org>
00005 //  Copyright(C) 2004-2006 Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corporation
00006 #include <iostream>
00007 #include <map>
00008 #include <vector>
00009 #include <string>
00010 #include "mecab.h"
00011 #include "dictionary_rewriter.h"
00012 #include "char_property.h"
00013 #include "param.h"
00014 #include "connector.h"
00015 #include "dictionary.h"
00016 
00017 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00018 #include "config.h"
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 namespace MeCab {
00022 
00023 class DictionaryComplier {
00024  public:
00025   static int run(int argc, char **argv) {
00026     static const MeCab::Option long_options[] = {
00027       { "dicdir",   'd',   ".",   "DIR", "set DIR as dicdi (default \".\")" },
00028       { "outdir",   'o',   ".",   "DIR",
00029         "set DIR as output dir (default \".\")" },
00030       { "unknown",  'U',   0,   0,   "build parameters for unknown words" },
00031       { "userdic",  'u',   0,   "FILE",   "build user dictionary" },
00032       { "charcategory", 'C', 0, 0,   "build character category maps" },
00033       { "matrix",    'm',  0,   0,   "build connection matrix" },
00034       { "charset",   'c',  MECAB_DEFAULT_CHARSET, "ENC",
00035         "make charset of binary dictionary ENC (default "
00036         MECAB_DEFAULT_CHARSET ")"  },
00037       { "charset",   't',  MECAB_DEFAULT_CHARSET, "ENC", "alias of -c"  },
00038 // MODIFY START - JUN
00039 // to enable the "dictionary-charset" entry in "dicrc" file, set the default value to empty below.
00040       //{ "dictionary-charset",  'f',  MECAB_DEFAULT_CHARSET,
00041       { "dictionary-charset",  'f',  0,
00042 // MODIFY END - JUN
00043         "ENC", "assume charset of input CSVs as ENC (default "
00044         MECAB_DEFAULT_CHARSET ")"  },
00045       { "wakati",    'w',  0,   0,   "build wakati-gaki only dictionary", },
00046       { "posid",     'p',  0,   0,   "assign Part-of-speech id" },
00047       { "node-format", 'F', 0,  "STR",
00048         "use STR as the user defined node format" },
00049       { "version",   'v',  0,   0,   "show the version and exit."  },
00050       { "help",      'h',  0,   0,   "show this help and exit."  },
00051       { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00052     };
00053 
00054     Param param;
00055 
00056     if (!param.open(argc, argv, long_options)) {
00057       std::cout << param.what() << "\n\n" <<  COPYRIGHT
00058                 << "\ntry '--help' for more information." << std::endl;
00059       return -1;
00060     }
00061 
00062     if (!param.help_version()) return 0;
00063 
00064     const std::string dicdir = param.get<std::string>("dicdir");
00065     const std::string outdir = param.get<std::string>("outdir");
00066     bool opt_unknown = param.get<bool>("unknown");
00067     bool opt_matrix = param.get<bool>("matrix");
00068     bool opt_charcategory = param.get<bool>("charcategory");
00069     bool opt_sysdic = param.get<bool>("sysdic");
00070     const std::string userdic = param.get<std::string>("userdic");
00071 
00072 #define DCONF(file) create_filename(dicdir, std::string(file)).c_str()
00073 #define OCONF(file) create_filename(outdir, std::string(file)).c_str()
00074 
00075     CHECK_DIE(param.load(DCONF(DICRC)))
00076         << "no such file or directory: " << DCONF(DICRC);
00077 
00078 // ADD START - JUN
00079 // if the "dictionary-charset" entry is not defined in "dicrc" file or command option,
00080 // it would be reset to "MECAB_DEFAULT_CHARSET" before dictionary compiling.
00081     if(param.get<std::string>("dictionary-charset").empty())
00082     {
00083         param.set<std::string>("dictionary-charset", MECAB_DEFAULT_CHARSET);
00084     }
00085 // ADD END - JUN
00086 
00087     std::vector<std::string> dic;
00088     if (userdic.empty())
00089       enum_csv_dictionaries(dicdir.c_str(), &dic);
00090     else
00091       dic = param.rest_args();
00092 
00093     if (!userdic.empty()) {
00094       CHECK_DIE(dic.size()) << "no dictionaries are specified";
00095 
00096       param.set("type", MECAB_USR_DIC);
00097       Dictionary::compile(param, dic,
00098                           DCONF(MATRIX_DEF_FILE),
00099                           DCONF(MATRIX_FILE),
00100                           DCONF(LEFT_ID_FILE),
00101                           DCONF(RIGHT_ID_FILE),
00102                           DCONF(REWRITE_FILE),
00103                           DCONF(POS_ID_FILE),
00104                           userdic.c_str());
00105     } else {
00106       if (!opt_unknown && !opt_matrix && !opt_charcategory && !opt_sysdic) {
00107         opt_unknown = opt_matrix = opt_charcategory = opt_sysdic = true;
00108       }
00109 
00110       if (opt_charcategory || opt_unknown) {
00111         CharProperty::compile(DCONF(CHAR_PROPERTY_DEF_FILE),
00112                               DCONF(UNK_DEF_FILE),
00113                               OCONF(CHAR_PROPERTY_FILE));
00114       }
00115 
00116       if (opt_unknown) {
00117         std::vector<std::string> tmp;
00118         tmp.push_back(DCONF(UNK_DEF_FILE));
00119         param.set("type", MECAB_UNK_DIC);
00120         Dictionary::compile(param, tmp,
00121                             DCONF(MATRIX_DEF_FILE),
00122                             DCONF(MATRIX_FILE),
00123                             DCONF(LEFT_ID_FILE),
00124                             DCONF(RIGHT_ID_FILE),
00125                             DCONF(REWRITE_FILE),
00126                             DCONF(POS_ID_FILE),
00127                             OCONF(UNK_DIC_FILE));
00128       }
00129 
00130       if (opt_sysdic) {
00131         CHECK_DIE(dic.size()) << "no dictionaries are specified";
00132         param.set("type", MECAB_SYS_DIC);
00133         Dictionary::compile(param, dic,
00134                             DCONF(MATRIX_DEF_FILE),
00135                             DCONF(MATRIX_FILE),
00136                             DCONF(LEFT_ID_FILE),
00137                             DCONF(RIGHT_ID_FILE),
00138                             DCONF(REWRITE_FILE),
00139                             DCONF(POS_ID_FILE),
00140                             OCONF(SYS_DIC_FILE));
00141       }
00142 
00143       if (opt_matrix) {
00144         Connector::compile(DCONF(MATRIX_DEF_FILE),
00145                            OCONF(MATRIX_FILE));
00146       }
00147     }
00148 
00149     std::cout << "\ndone!\n";
00150 
00151     return 0;
00152   }
00153 };
00154 
00155 #undef DCONF
00156 #undef OCONF
00157 }
00158 
00159 int mecab_dict_index(int argc, char **argv) {
00160   return MeCab::DictionaryComplier::run(argc, argv);
00161 }
